action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains 7 blocks. There are two pink blocks, one is a square and the other is a T shape. There are two green blocks, both are T shapes. There is one purple block, a plus shape. There are two orange blocks, one is an L shape and the other is a backwards L shape.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: There are six shapes in the image. One is a yellow plus sign, one is a yellow "U" shape, one is a purple "L" shape, one is a purple "W" shape, one is an orange "T" shape, and one is a red "T" shape. The "W" shape is on top of the "T" shape. The "T" shape is on top of the "U" shape. The "L" shape is on the right side of the image. The "T" shape is on the left side of the image. The plus sign is in the middle of the image.

QUESTION: Are any of the blocks stacked on top of each other?
